Share App
Privacy policy Other apps from developer ListEverything Fifi's eWriter About Version: Hello users,

In V3.2,
- Oil sap value has been added to recipes.
- "Coconut oil, fractionated" and "palm olein" are added to the oils list.

Thanks to the people who left reviews, I will continually update the app and add more features.

If you have any suggestions, please send me an email by using the "Feedback" option in the main menu on left side.

If you like this app, please give it a review at Google Play Store, thanks for using SoapCal :-)

InterestingOnes

Your Soap Recipe List Recipe list is empty. Create a recipe?
Click to choose oil… NaOH discount: NaOH purity: If you don't know the purity of NaOH, just leave this field empty. The calculator will use 100% as the default value.

In this case, the final NaOH weight will be little less than the actual NaOH weight you need.

That means there will be some oil not getting saponified finally, which will become some extra superfatting besides the amount you enter in the superfatting field below. Water *: Water: times of NaOH weight Superfatting: % of total oil weight Superfatting oil name Essential oil: % of total soap weight Essential oil name Additive: Additive name Reset Unit setting Calculate * For soapmaking supplies, please check with your local grocery stores, or online stores like Amazon. calculating_method * Hello users, regarding the calculation methods, there are several kinds to create soap recipes, the one used in this app is from a Japanese soap maker - Kyoko Maeda who I like very much. 

This method may not be your favorite one but no matter which method we use, the final recipes are same. If you don't get used to this method, please check out other soap calculator apps, thank you for using SoapCal :-) * The oil sap value used in this app may be a little bit different with the one you usually use, that's because the data are from different sources, but they should be very close and won't affect the soap much due to superfatting. Enjoy Soapmaking :-)
